properties.displayName: Publisher Attachment File Dropped In Suspicious Location
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where (FolderPath contains "\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\" or FolderPath contains "\\Users\\Public\\" or FolderPath contains "\\Windows\\Temp\\" or FolderPath contains "C:\\Temp\\") and FolderPath endswith ".pub"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects creation of files with the ".pub" extension in suspicious or uncommon locations. This could be a sign of attackers abusing Publisher documents
